it.polito.computervision.gestures.impl

Class ClickGesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.gestures.AbstractGesture
      • it.polito.computervision.gestures.impl.ClickGesture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gesture

    public class ClickGesture
extends AbstractGesture
    Detects a click with one hand. If multiple hands are being detected, the first one that is found touching the VirtualScreen will be the one tracked for a click.
    Author:
    giovanni

      • doUpdateState

        public GestureState doUpdateState(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands,
                         java.util.Collection<HandData> gestureHands)
        Concrete gestures must implement this method. The semantics are the same of Gesture.updateState(Collection, Collection).
        Specified by:
        doUpdateState in class AbstractGesture
        Parameters:
        hands - The HandData being tracked during this frame
        gestureHands - The HandData this gesture is tracking
        Returns:
        The GestureState this gesture is in after the update.
